prompt:
Please create a list of 1 ideas for types of synthetic tabular data, with descriptions for the data they would contain, and what they might be useful for. Each dataset should be at least somewhat related to invasive species.

Each item in the list should follow this format:
* [Name of the dataset] Data: This dataset would contain [description for the data it contains]. It could be used to [what it might be useful for].
response_text: 1. Invasive Species Location Data: This dataset would contain information about the geographical locations of invasive species, such as their latitude and longitude coordinates, as well as other related data such as the date and time of observation. It could be used to track the spread of invasive species over time and space in order to better understand their environmental impacts.

dataset_ideas.name: Invasive Species Location Data
dataset_ideas.about: information about the geographical locations of invasive species, such as their latitude and longitude coordinates, as well as other related data such as the date and time of observation
dataset_ideas.use_cases: track the spread of invasive species over time and space in order to better understand their environmental impacts
